name: Simplifyd Systems
headline: We deliver toll-free internet apps
description:
Simplifyd enables businesses deliver their internet apps (websites/mobile apps) data-free, similar to toll-free telephone lines. We do this through our Zerodata app

Founded in August of 2021 and based in Lagos, Nigeria and Nairobi, Kenya, Simplifyd through its Zerodata platform is a trusted marketplace for data-free internet apps. 

Businesses list their internet apps (websites/mobile apps) on the Zerodata platform so end users can access them data-free!

End users simply need to download the Zerodata app, available for both mobile and desktop, toggle on and enjoy access to listed apps data-free!

We are on a mission to make apps accessible to over ~2B people in emerging economies who simply cannot afford the costs of internet data subscriptions.

# Infraless, #datafree cloud platform.
Simplifyd is an integrated #datafree cloud platform that provides fast and quick deployments for websites, web applications, APIs and data stores all from your terminal.
[Deploy your first app](https://simplifyd.com/<https:/docs.simplifyd.com/cli-installation/>)[See Pricing](https://simplifyd.com/</pricing>)
## Africa focused, global cloud infrastructure.
Built with care in Africa.
We understand what devs want from a cloud platform - super simple to use. Fast. Scalable. Low latency and high throughput.
Simplifyd has infrastructure in Lagos & Nairobi connected to the fastest IXPs in both regions.
### Why Simplifyd?
  * ### Local Currency Billing
Get billed in your local currency. Whether it's the Nigerian Naira or the Kenyan Shilling, we've got you.
  * ### Custom domains, SSL/TLS & Certs
No tedious certificate renewals and DNS management.
  * ### Apps one-hop away
With simplifyd, your apps are on the fast path. Reduced latency and RTT.
  * ### Supports your framework
You don’t have to change your current workflow. Major languages and frameworks supported.


How it works
#### Link to git and enjoy automatic deploys.
With a push to git and automatic deploys, your application is live. Always fast, scalable and simple.
[Read the documentation](https://simplifyd.com/<https:/docs.simplifyd.com/>)
  * 1.
![Github](https://simplifyd.com/images/github.svg)![Bitbucket](https://simplifyd.com/images/bitbucket.svg)![Fox](https://simplifyd.com/images/fox.svg)
#### Link your git repository
Link your git repo (Github, Bitbucket & GitLab supported) and every push triggers automated deploys.
  * 2.
```
 edge deploy Branch new-logo set up to track remote branch new-logo from origin.To simplifyd.com:acme/my-site.git* [new branch] * new-logo -> new-logo  simplifyd build complete!acme [new-logo] ~
```

#### Add your build settings
Confgure Simplifyd by setting your preferred web frameworks build settings.
  * 3.
STAGING URL
https://test.simplifyd.app
ADDON DOMAINS
https://example.app
STATUS
Live
#### Deployment Done!
On deployment, Simplifyd gives you a shareable preview URL. Add your custom domain name to go live!


### Build apps, not infrastructure
Leave the grunt work to us
At simplifyd, we believe you should focus on your core idea and not have to waste time on infrastructure. You should spend time doing only what you love to do - building the best apps! We love to build easy to use infrastructure.
### Supports modern frameworks and tooling.
Simplifyd Cloud supports all major frameworks and programming languages and deploys your frontend and backend stacks close to your users wherever they may be. Anything that can be containerized (Dockerized) would run on Simplifyd Cloud.

### Simplifyd Systems: Your Toll-Free Access to the Internet

Founded in August 2021 and based in bustling metro hubs of Lagos, Nigeria, and Nairobi, Kenya, **Simplifyd Systems** is on a mission to revolutionize access to the internet in emerging markets. They’re not just another tech company; they enable businesses to deliver their internet apps—be it websites or mobile apps—without incurring data charges, akin to the concept of toll-free phone lines. Thanks to their flagship product, **Zerodata**, users can access these apps without worrying about paying for data, making the internet far more accessible.

#### The Zerodata Platform

The Zerodata app represents an innovative solution in a marketplace where data costs can be prohibitive. Here’s how it works: businesses list their apps on the Zerodata platform, and end-users simply download the app to enjoy data-free access. It’s available for both mobile and desktop, making it conveniently accessible for everyone. The vision is ambitious—aiming to provide access to internet apps for over 2 billion people in emerging economies who struggle to afford standard data plans.

#### Streamlined Deployments for Developers

Beyond just making apps accessible, Simplifyd is also a powerful cloud platform designed specifically for developers. They pride themselves on being a data-free, infraless environment that facilitates fast deployments for web applications, APIs, and data stores right from your terminal. With infrastructure in Lagos and Nairobi, they ensure low latency and high throughput to deliver apps quickly and reliably.

#### Why Choose Simplifyd?

Here are a few standout features that set Simplifyd apart:

- **Local Currency Billing:** No need to deal with conversion rates; you can pay in your local currency.
- **No Hassles with SSL/TLS:** Forget tedious certificate renewals and DNS management—Simplifyd streamlines that process.
- **One-Hop App Access:** Reduces latency so users can access apps quickly.
- **Support for Multiple Frameworks:** Maintain your workflow without having to switch frameworks. Simplifyd is compatible with major languages and frameworks.

#### Built For Developers, By Developers

The core philosophy at Simplifyd is to liberate developers from the complexities of infrastructure management, allowing them to focus solely on building great applications. The platform supports modern frameworks and can deploy your frontend and backend stacks close to users, ensuring optimal performance.

In a nutshell, Simplifyd Systems utilizes cutting-edge technology to simplify access to the internet while making app deployment a breeze for developers. Their focus on providing a no-cost entry point for users in developing regions and a seamless experience for developers makes them a compelling player in the tech landscape.

If you’re curious to dive in, check out their website at [simplifyd.com](https://simplifyd.com) for more information on their services or to start your journey with data-free internet apps!
